title: PORK AND VEAL LASAGNA
directions: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Grease a deep 12x8 inch baking dish.

Heat oil in a large deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook ground meat and garlic, stirring, for 8-10 mins, or until meat browns. Add tomatoes and tomato paste. Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer for 30 mins, or until sauce thickens. Stir in basil.
Meanwhile, combine ricotta, eggs and Parmesan in a medium bowl.

Cover base of prepared dish with 1/2 cup meat sauce. Top with 2 lasagna sheets, 1/2 the ricotta mixture and 1/3 of the mozzarella. Top with 1/3 of the remaining meat sauce. Repeat layers. Top with remaining lasagna, meat sauce and mozzarella. Bake, covered, for 40 mins. Uncover and bake for 20 mins, or until tender. Let stand for 10 mins. Serve with salad.
